text: Vans is an American manufacturer of skateboarding shoes. They also make similar apparel. They are based in Santa Ana, California. They are owned by VF Corporation. The company also sponsors surf, snowboarding, BMX, and motocross teams. Since 1996, the company has been the primary sponsor of the annual Vans Warped Tour traveling rock festival. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1966 establishments in California Category:American clothing companies Category:Santa Ana, California Category:Companies based in California
title: Vans
